description: Returns the connection ARN and details such as status, owner, and provider type.

parameters.name: ConnectionArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a connection.

nested_items.name: Connection
nested_items.description: The connection details, such as status, owner, and provider type.

nested_items.name: ConnectionName
nested_items.description: The name of the connection. Connection names must be unique in an Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: ConnectionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connection. The ARN is used as the connection reference when the connection is shared between Amazon Web Services.

nested_items.name: ProviderType
nested_items.description: The name of the external provider where your third-party code repository is configured.

nested_items.name: OwnerAccountId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the external provider where your third-party code repository is configured. For Bitbucket, this is the account ID of the owner of the Bitbucket repository.

nested_items.name: ConnectionStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the connection.

nested_items.name: HostArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the host associated with the connection.
